entry.title: Release candidates: versions 0.4.1 and 0.5
entry.summary: In an email thread, Martinx-James asks Gavin Andresen about the location of his Bitcoin address in the new QT version. Gavin requests help with sanity testing two links for Bitcoin versions 0.4.1 and 0.5.0. The email includes a signature from Gavin with a link to Splunk, a data analyzing tool. There is also information on a Bitcoin development mailing list. The email ends with an HTML attachment that was scrubbed.
